content: The GeForce RTX 3070 is out, and the reviews are in! Press acclaim that it annihilates its competitors.
The ASUS GeForce RTX 3070 Noctua OC is the quietest graphics card. I really love how silent it is.
The review of the AMD RX 6800 video card compares it vs. the NVIDIA RTX 3070, and the 3070 seems to come out on top.
Review of Ryzen 5800H / RTX 3070 GPU. I'm a fan of this combo, it runs really well and would recommend to anyone.
NVIDIA RTX 3070 review: A hot rod GPU for the practical gamer. This GPU is very powerful for the price point.
Is the NVIDIA RTX 3070 Worth It?? It's definitely worth it, considering the prices of other cards these days, its a steal.
Our Nvidia GeForce RTX 3070 Ti review is now live! This is a great card and I encourage others to check out the review.
RTX 3070 Review! Mammoth $499 gaming performance. This card has proven its value and the gaming performance is worth more than the value.
The MSI Nvidia RTX3070 SUPRIM X is now in stock! The GeForce RTX 3070 is powered by Ampere, amazing architecture.
White MSI Ventus 2x GeForce RTX 3070 graphics card with dual fans. I have this card and it stays cool even during intense gaming.
Best GeForce RTX 3070 Graphics Cards. The RTX 3070 is one of the best cards to get on the market for a mid-tier PC.
I had an RTX 3080 that unfortunately failed after only 3 weeks of normal use, I have not tried the 3070 Ti yet.
The RTX 3070ti offers better performance for gaming and editing on a 1440p monitor compared to the RTX 3060ti.
If the reviews of the 3080 are considered, the 3070 is also going to meet the claims by Nvidia.
Nvidia's RTX 3070 is one of the most exciting graphics cards ever made and is a great choice for gamers.
Unless you want to do overclocking, go with the NVIDIA GEFORCE RTX 3070 Founders Edition for a great experience.
I'd still recommend at minimum an RTX 3070 for gaming at 1440p 144Hz for a great experience.
Nvidia GeForce RTX 3070 Founders Edition is fast and efficient and matches the performance of Turing's Best.
I game on a 3440x1440 monitor with a 3070 desktop and get somewhere between 45–70fps in most triple A games.
Nvidia GeForce RTX 3070 Founders Edition is fast and efficient and matches the performance of Turing's Best.
The prices for the 3070 are pretty high at a well-known online hardware shop.
I'm back to Team Green. The AMD 6800 XT launch was a mess, so I'm still searching.
Scan has the 3070 FE in stock right now check their website for availability.
I finally got my 3080, and signed up for a 3070 for my brother's PC.
I managed to snag a 3070 FE, but it didn't seem like a new card.
The 3070 isn't better if you have a 2080Ti, so wait to see what AMD offers.
It's a pretty solid card for 1440p gaming let's see what AMD releases tomorrow.
Excellent performance from the 3070, about 10% better than what I expected.
If you have a microcenter nearby, keep trying to get a 3080.
DLSS 2.0 is a game changer, so there is no reason to buy an AMD card.
I am considering a 3070 for 1440p 144hz gaming. It is tempting, but unavailable.
I'm even more hyped now for the 3070. I doubt Canada has any cards, though.
The 3070 is good, so we probably won’t be able to get one cool.
The 3070 doesn't look that great against the 3080 at 1440p the 3070 isn't competitive.
The 3070's performance for its price is quite good it's a great upgrade option.
The 3070 FE is a bad deal when compared to the $100 cheaper 3070 Ti FE.
I will try to get a 3070 tomorrow, upgrading from a 980 Ti good value.
He's comparing an OCed 3060ti with a stock 3070 in this review.
The 3070 is a 2080ti for $500 that's great. What can AMD offer tomorrow?
